WIOA Programs

The University of La Verne’s Extended Learning department offers various professional development certificate programs eligible for funding under the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act (WIOA). WIOA is landmark legislation designed to strengthen and improve our nation’s public workforce system and help Americans, including youth and those with significant barriers to employment, into high-quality jobs and careers. WIOA services include:

  • Career Counseling
  • Training Programs
  • Job Search Assistance

 

Participants that Qualify for WIOA funding

You may be eligible for WIOA funding if you are:

  • Unemployed
  • Low-Income
  • A dislocated worker *
  • Out of School Youth (18-24)
  • A veteran
  • Justice Impacted

 

University of La Verne’s Career Pathway Training programs

The University of La Verne is an approved training provider under the State of California Eligible Training Provider List (ETPL). California’s ETPL includes qualified training providers who offer a wide range of education programs, including classroom, online, and apprenticeship programs. This list is used by the State’s public workforce system including America’s Job Centers of California, Employment Development Department, CA Department of Rehabilitation and Supplemental Job Displacement Benefits. All of the following programs are WIOA approved and identified as programs that lead to high-demand occupations.

Medical Coding (CPC) Certificate $3,999
Certificate in Construction Management Certificate $2,399
SHRM Certificate in Human Resource Management Certificate $2,299
Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Certificate $2,299
Fundamentals Payroll Certification (FPC) and Certified Payroll Certificate $2,799
Project Management Professional Certificate $2,999
SHRM California Law HR Specialty Credential Certificate $1,799
SHRM SCP/CP – Human Resource Management with California Law Combo $4,558
SHRM Certificate in Human Resources Management Program with APA FPC/CPP Payroll Certificate Combo $5,098
SHRM California Law HR Specialty Credential with APA FPC/CPP Payroll Certificate $4,598
Project Management With Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Certificate Combo $5,298
Project Management Professional (PMP) With SHRM Certificate In Human Resource Management Certificate Combo $5,298
Project Management Professional (PMP) With Certificate In Construction Management Certificate Combo $4,998

 

Check on Eligibility

Please contact your local America’s Job Center (AJCC) to find out if your eligible for WIOA funding. AJCC’s in your area may be referred to as WorkSource Centers, One Stops, or Local Workforce Development Boards. To find an AJCC near you visit Career One Stop’s American Job Center Finder. Once you have been determined WIOA eligible, you will be assigned a career counselor to guide you through career pathway planning and development of an individual employment plan. If your employment plan includes training activities, a career counselor will recommend training research activities and career assessments to help you find the right training program.

Contact us at extendedlearning@laverne.edu or jrush@laverne.edu to find out more about our WIOA-funded programs.
